fish eggs are really important without

if parenting occurs that Duty is

because their eggs are usually

can be more confident that he's the

nursery fish are hatchets shaped 10 to
30 centimeter long fish native to the
fresh and brackish waters of northern
Australia and southern New Guinea and
then got their name because each male
has a hook for carrying eggs which stems
from the super occipital bone at the top
of what we would call his forehead the
skin around this bony hook is fleshy and
full of blood vessels and it has a
cavity that scientists think help hold
the eggs in place in fact this tissue
may feed the eggs and help them breathe
too no one has ever seen how a male gets
eggs onto his hook but they're most
likely transferred before they're
fertilized he may even like pull them

ink but however he acquires the eggs
theologists think that after they're

a cloud of sperm and
through it to fertilize them which of
course ensures that they are his own

though because this species doesn't do
